Name: Border
Description: Container that draws a border and can host a child.

Properties.Name: SafeAreaEdges
Properties.Description: Controls which edges respect the device safe area.

Properties.Name: Stroke
Properties.Description: Brush used to draw the border stroke.

Properties.Name: StrokeLineCap
Properties.Description: Line cap style of the stroke.

Properties.Name: StrokeLineJoin
Properties.Description: Line join style of the stroke.

Properties.Name: StrokeMiterLimit
Properties.Description: Miter limit for the stroke joins.
